EntryName	SMAP2_HUMAN
ProteinName	Stromal membrane-associated protein 2 (Stromal membrane-associated protein 1-like)
GeneName	SMAP2 SMAP1L
Length	399
Function	GTPase activating protein that acts on ARF1. Can also activate ARF6 (in vitro). May play a role in clathrin-dependent retrograde transport from early endosomes to the trans-Golgi network (By similarity).
